filters.description: Conditions that make this entry in the list valid

max_dist.description:
Maximum distance this mob can be away to be a valid choice
Default: 16

must_see.description:
If true, the mob has to be visible to be a valid choice
Default: false

must_see_forget_duration.description:
Determines the amount of time in seconds that this mob will look for a target before forgetting about it and looking for a new one when the target isn't visible any more
Default: 3.0

sprint_speed_multiplier.description:
Multiplier for the running speed. A value of 1.0 means the speed is unchanged
Default: 1.0

walk_speed_multiplier.description:
Multiplier for the walking speed. A value of 1.0 means the speed is unchanged
Default: 1.0

minecraft:behavior.hide.description: Allows a mob with the hide component to attempt to move to - and hide at - an owned or nearby POI.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

duration.description:
Amount of time in seconds that the mob reacts.
Default: 1.0

poi_type.description: Defines what POI type to hide at.

speed_multiplier.description:
Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal
Default: 1.0

timeout_cooldown.description:
The cooldown time in seconds before the goal can be reused after a internal failure or timeout condition.
Default: 8.0

minecraft:behavior.move_to_poi.description: Allows the mob to move to a POI if able to

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

poi_type.description: Tells the goal what POI type it should be looking for

speed_multiplier.description:
Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal
Default: 1.0

minecraft:behavior.scared.description: Allows the a mob to become scared when the weather outside is thundering

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

sound_interval.description:
The interval in which a sound will play when active in a 1/delay chance to kick off
Default: 0

minecraft:behavior.work.description: allows the NPC to use their jobsite POI

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

active_time.description:
The amount of ticks the NPC will stay in their the work location
Default: 0

can_work_in_rain.description:
If true, this entity can work when their jobsite POI is being rained on.
Default: false

goal_cooldown.description:
The amount of ticks the goal will be on cooldown before it can be used again
Default: 0

on_arrival.description: Event to run when the mob reaches their jobsite and finishes working.

sound_delay_max.description:
The max interval in which a sound will play
Default: 0

sound_delay_min.description:
The min interval in which a sound will play
Default: 0

speed_multiplier.description:
Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal
Default: 1.0

work_in_rain_tolerance.description:
If "can_work_in_rain" is false, this is the maximum number of ticks left in the goal where rain will not interrupt the goal
Default: -1

avoid_mob_sound.description: The sound event to play when the mob is angry

sound_interval.description: The range of time in seconds to randomly wait before playing the sound again

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

entity_types.description: List of entity types this mob avoids.

ignore_visibility.description:
If true, visbility between this entity and the mob type will not be checked.
Default: false

max_dist.description:
Maximum distance to look for an entity
Default: 0.0

max_flee.description:
Distance in blocks within the mob considers it should stop fleeing.
Default: 0.5

probability_per_strength.description:
Determines how likely it is that this entity will stop avoiding another entity based on that entity's strength
Default: 1.0

sprint_speed_multiplier.description:
Multiplier for running speed. 1.0 means keep the regular speed, while higher numbers make the running speed faster
Default: 1.0

walk_speed_multiplier.description:
Multiplier for walking speed. 1.0 means keep the regular speed, while higher numbers make the walking speed faster
Default: 1.0

minecraft:behavior.avoid_mob_type.description: Allows this entity to avoid certain mob types.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

items.description: List of items that this mob likes

look_distance.description:
Distance in blocks the mob will beg from
Default: 8.0

look_time.description:
The range of time in seconds this mob will stare at the player holding a food they like, begging for it
Default: [2, 4]

minecraft:behavior.beg.description: Allows this mob to look at and follow the player that holds food they like.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

minecraft:behavior.break_door.description: Allows this mob to break doors.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

speed_multiplier.description:
Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal
Default: 1.0

minecraft:behavior.breed.description: Allows this mob to breed with other mobs.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

duration.description:
The duration of the celebration (in seconds).
Default: 1.0

jump_interval.description:
The range of time in seconds to randomly wait before jumping again.
Default: 0

on_celebration_end_event.description: The event to trigger when the goal's duration expires.

sound_interval.description:
The range of time in seconds to randomly wait before playing the sound again.
Default: 0

minecraft:behavior.celebrate.description: This allows the mob celebrate by jumping up and playing a sound periodically.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

minecraft:behavior.charge_attack.description: Allows the mob to attack its target by running at it.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

items.description: The list of items that can be used to charge the held item.

minecraft:behavior.charge_held_item.description: Allows this mob to charge and use their held item.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

goal_radius.description:
Distance in blocks within the mob considers it has reached the goal. This is the "wiggle room" to stop the AI from bouncing back and forth trying to reach a specific spot
Default: 0.5

height_above_target_range.description:
When the mob finds a target, the range of height in blocks above the target to start the anchor point.
Default: [0.0, 0.0]

height_change_chance.description:
A random value to determine when to change the height of the mob from the anchor point. This has a 1/value chance every tick to do so.
Default: 350

height_offset_range.description:
The range of height in blocks offset the mob can have from it's anchor point.
Default: [0.0, 0.0]

radius_change_chance.description:
A random value to determine when to increase the size of the radius up to the maximum. This has a 1/value chance every tick to do so.
Default: 250

radius_range.description:
Range of radius in blocks of the circle to move around.
Default: [5.0, 15.0]

speed_multiplier.description:
Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal
Default: 1.0

minecraft:behavior.circle_around_anchor.description: Allows the mob to move in a circle around a point or a target.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

minecraft:behavior.controlled_by_player.description: Allows the mob to be controlled by the player.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

aggro_sound.description: Sound to occasionally play while defending.

attack_interval.description:
Time in seconds between attacks
Default: 0

entity_types.description: List of entity types that this mob considers valid targets

must_see.description:
If true, only entities in this mob's viewing range can be selected as targets
Default: false

must_see_forget_duration.description:
Determines the amount of time in seconds that this mob will look for a target before forgetting about it and looking for a new one when the target isn't visible any more
Default: 3.0

within_radius.description:
Distance in blocks that the target can be within to launch an attack
Default: 0.0

minecraft:behavior.defend_trusted_target.description: Allows the mob to target another mob that hurts an entity it trusts.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

entity_types.description: List of entity types this mob considers a threat to the village

minecraft:behavior.defend_village_target.description: Allows the mob to stay in the village and fight mobs hostile to the villagers.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

attack_duration.description:
The duration of the attack animation in seconds
Default: 1.0

attack_once.description:
If true, this mob will attack only one time.
Default: false

attack_types.description: Defines the entity types this mob will attack

hit_delay_pct.description:
The percentage of the attack_duration that must pass before the hit is made
Default: 1.0

random_stop_interval.description:
Defines the probability the mob will stop fighting. A value of 0 disables randomly stopping, while a value of 1 defines a 50% chance
Default: 0

reach_multiplier.description:
Multiplier for how far outside its box the mob can reach its target (this can be used to simulate a mob with longer arms by making this bigger)
Default: 2.0

sound_event.description: The sound event to play when the attack starts

speed_multiplier.description:
Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal
Default: 1.0

track_target.description:
If true, this mob will chase after the target as long as it's a valid target
Default: false

minecraft:behavior.delayed_attack.description: Allows the mob to an attack where the hit is delayed.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

minecraft:behavior.door_interact.description: Allows the mob to open and close doors.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

minecraft:behavior.dragonchargeplayer.description: Allows the dragon to attack a player by flying fast at them. The player is chosen by the dragonscanning goal. Can only be used by the Ender Dragon.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

minecraft:behavior.dragondeath.description: Allows the dragon to go out with glory. This controls the Ender Dragon's death animation and can't be used by other mobs.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

minecraft:behavior.dragonflaming.description: Allows the dragon to use its flame breath attack. Can only be used by the Ender Dragon.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

minecraft:behavior.dragonholdingpattern.description: Allows the Dragon to fly around in a circle around the center podium. Can only be used by the Ender Dragon.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

minecraft:behavior.dragonlanding.description: Allows the Dragon to stop flying and transition into perching mode. Can only be used by the Ender Dragon.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

minecraft:behavior.dragonscanning.description: Allows the dragon to look around for a player to attack while in perch mode. Can only be used by the Ender Dragon.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

minecraft:behavior.dragonstrafeplayer.description: Allows the dragon to fly around looking for a player and shoot fireballs at them. Can only be used by the Ender Dragon.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

minecraft:behavior.dragontakeoff.description: Allows the dragon to leave perch mode and go back to flying around. Can only be used by the Ender Dragon.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

potions.description: A list of potions that this entity can drink. Each potion entry has the following parameters:

chance.description:
The percent chance (from 0.0 to 1.0) of this potion being selected when searching for a potion to use.
Default: 1.0

filters.description: The filters to use when determining if this potion can be selected.

id.description:
The registry ID of the potion to use
Default: -1

minecraft:behavior.drink_potion.description: Allows the mob to drink potions based on specified environment conditions.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

drop_item_chance.description:
The probability that the mob will drop an item.
Default: [1.0]

entity_types.description: List of entity types this mob will drop items for.

goal_radius.description:
Distance in blocks within the mob considers it has reached the goal. This is the "wiggle room" to stop the AI from bouncing back and forth trying to reach a specific spot
Default: 0.5

loot_table.description: Loot table to select items from.

max_dist.description:
Maximum distance in blocks this mob will look for entities to drop an item for.
Default: 0.0

offering_distance.description:
The distance in blocks the mob will try to be away from the entity when it drops the item.
Default: [1.0]

on_drop_attempt.description: Event to run when this mob attempts to drop an item.

search_height.description:
Height in blocks from the target the mob can be.
Default: 1

search_range.description:
The distance in blocks from the target the mob can be.
Default: 0

speed_multiplier.description:
Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal
Default: 1.0

time_of_day_range.description:
The valid times of day that this goal can be used.  For reference: noon is 0.0, sunset is 0.25, midnight is 0.5, and sunrise is 0.75, and back to noon for 1.0.
Default: [0.0, 1.0]

minecraft:behavior.drop_item_for.description: Allows the mob to move near a target and drop an item.

on_eat.description: Trigger to fire when the mob eats a block of grass

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

delay_before_eating.description: Time in seconds the mob should wait before eating the item.

minecraft:behavior.eat_carried_item.description: If the mob is carrying a food item, the mob will eat it and the effects will be applied to the mob.

avoid_water.description:
If true, the mob will not go into water blocks when going towards a mount
Default: false

mount_distance.description:
This is the distance the mob needs to be, in blocks, from the desired mount to mount it. If the value is below 0, the mob will use its default attack distance
Default: -1.0

start_delay.description:
Time the mob will wait before starting to move towards the mount
Default: 0

target_needed.description:
If true, the mob will only look for a mount if it has a target
Default: false

within_radius.description:
Distance in blocks within which the mob will look for a mount
Default: 0.0

The range that the mob will search for a treasure chest within a ruin or shipwreck to move towards.

Default: 1.0

stop_distance.description:

attack_once.description:
If true, this mob will attack only one time.
Default: false

attack_types.description: Defines the entity types this mob will attack

melee_fov.description:
The allowable FOV the actor will use to determine if it can make a valid melee attack
Default: 90.0

random_stop_interval.description:
Defines the probability the mob will stop fighting. A value of 0 disables randomly stopping, while a value of 1 defines a 50% chance
Default: 0

reach_multiplier.description:
Multiplier for how far outside its box the mob can reach its target (this can be used to simulate a mob with longer arms by making this bigger)
Default: 2.0

require_complete_path.description:
If true, this goal will only trigger if the mob can reach its target.
Default: false

speed_multiplier.description:
Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal
Default: 1.0

track_target.description:
If true, this mob will chase after the target as long as it's a valid target
Default: false

minecraft:behavior.melee_attack.description: Allows the mob to use close combat melee attacks.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

cooldown_time.description:
Time in seconds the mob has to wait before using the goal again
Default: 0.0

duration.description:
Amount of time in seconds that the entity will chat with another entity
Default: 1.0

mingle_distance.description:
The distance from its partner that this entity will mingle. If the entity type is not the same as the entity, this value needs to be identical on both entities.
Default: 2.0f

mingle_partner_type.description:
The entity type that this entity is allowed to mingle with
Default: empty

speed_multiplier.description:
Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal
Default: 1.0

minecraft:behavior.mingle.description: Allows an entity to go to the village bell and mingle with other entities

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

speed_multiplier.description:
Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal
Default: 1.0

target_dist.description:
The distance at which this mob wants to be away from its target
Default: 0.0

track_target.description:
If true, this mob will chase after the target as long as it's a valid target
Default: false

minecraft:behavior.mount_pathing.description: Allows the mob to move around on its own while mounted seeking a target to attack.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

speed_multiplier.description:
Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal
Default: 1.0

timeout_cooldown.description:
The cooldown time in seconds before the goal can be reused after a internal failure or timeout condition
Default: 8.0

minecraft:behavior.move_indoors.description: Can only be used by Villagers. Allows them to seek shelter indoors.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

only_at_night.description:
If true, the mob will only move through the village during night time
Default: false

speed_multiplier.description:
Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal
Default: 1.0

minecraft:behavior.move_through_village.description: Can only be used by Villagers. Allows the villagers to create paths around the village.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

goal_radius.description:
Distance in blocks within the mob considers it has reached the goal. This is the "wiggle room" to stop the AI from bouncing back and forth trying to reach a specific spot
Default: 0.5

on_reach.description: Trigger or list of triggers to trigger when the Mob comes within the 'goal_radius' of the target block.

on_stay_completed.description: Trigger or list of triggers to trigger when the Mob has stayed at the target block for 'stay_duration' time.

search_height.description:
The maximum height the Mob will look for target blocks
Default: 1

search_range.description:
The maximum distance the Mob will look for target blocks
Default: 0

speed_multiplier.description:
Multiplier for movement speed while moving towards the target block. 1.0 means no change in speed. 2.0 means twice as fast.
Default: 1.0

stay_duration.description:
Specifies a time that themob should stay at the target block. Fires 'on_stay_completed' after this duration.
Default: 0.0

target_blocks.description: List or string of block descriptions

target_offset.description:
The offset is added to the target blocks position where [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] means the center of the block.
Default: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0]

target_selection_method.description: Specifies what method of target selection should be used when there are multiple candidates within range. The available methods are 'nearest' and 'random'.

tick_interval.description:
Limits how often the mob searches for target blocks. 0 means every tick. Higher number means less often. Many mobs searching for blocks every tick could make the game run slower.
Default: 20

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

goal_radius.description:
Distance in blocks within the mob considers it has reached the goal. This is the "wiggle room" to stop the AI from bouncing back and forth trying to reach a specific spot
Default: 0.5

search_count.description:
The number of blocks each tick that the mob will check within it's search range and height for a valid block to move to. A value of 0 will have the mob check every block within range in one tick
Default: 10

search_height.description:
Height in blocks the mob will look for land to move towards
Default: 1

search_range.description:
The distance in blocks it will look for land to move towards
Default: 0

speed_multiplier.description:
Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal
Default: 1.0

minecraft:behavior.move_to_land.description: Allows the mob to move back onto land when in water.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

block_distance.description:
Defines the distance from the mob, in blocks, that the block to move to will be chosen.
Default: 16.0

within_radius.description:
Defines the distance in blocks the mob has to be from the block for the movement to be finished.
Default: 0.0

minecraft:behavior.move_to_random_block.description: Allows mob to move towards a random block.

Default: 0.0

Default: 0.5

search_range.description:
The distance in blocks to search for villages. If <= 0, find the closest village regardless of distance.
Default: 0

Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal
Default: 1.0

Default: 1.0

minecraft:behavior.move_towards_restrict.description: Allows Guardians, Iron Golems and Villagers to move within their pre-defined area that the mob should be restricted to. Other mobs don't have a restriction defined.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

within_radius.description:
Defines the radius in blocks that the mob tries to be from the target. A value of 0 means it tries to occupy the same block as the target
Default: 0.0

minecraft:behavior.move_towards_target.description: Allows mob to move towards its current target.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

cooldown_max.description:
Maximum time in seconds the mob has to wait before using the goal again
Default: 0.0

cooldown_min.description:
Minimum time in seconds the mob has to wait before using the goal again
Default: 0.0

mob_detect_dist.description:
The block distance in x and z that will be checked for mobs that this mob detects
Default: 6.0

mob_detect_height.description:
The block distance in y that will be checked for mobs that this mob detects
Default: 6.0

minecraft:behavior.nap.description: Allows mobs to occassionally stop and take a nap under certain conditions.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

attack_interval.description:
Time in seconds between attacks
Default: 0

entity_types.description: List of entity types that this mob considers valid targets

must_reach.description:
If true, only entities that this mob can path to can be selected as targets
Default: false

must_see.description:
If true, only entities in this mob's viewing range can be selected as targets
Default: false

must_see_forget_duration.description:
Determines the amount of time in seconds that this mob will look for a target before forgetting about it and looking for a new one when the target isn't visible any more
Default: 3.0

persist_time.description:
Time in seconds for a valid target to stay targeted when it becomes and invalid target.
Default: 0.0f

reselect_targets.description:
If true, the target will change to the current closest entity whenever a different entity is closer
Default: false

scan_interval.description:
How many ticks to wait between scanning for a target.
Default: 10

target_search_height.description:
Height in blocks to search for a target mob. -1.0f means the height does not matter.
Default: -1.0f

within_radius.description:
Distance in blocks that the target can be within to launch an attack
Default: 0.0

minecraft:behavior.nearest_attackable_ta.description: Allows the mob to check for and pursue the nearest valid target.

Specifies the priority in which filtered enemy types should be attacked. Lower number means higher priority.
Default: 0

Default: 0

sneak_speed_multiplier.description:
Multiplier for the sneaking speed. 1.0 means the ocelot will move at the speed it normally sneaks
Default: 1.0

sprint_speed_multiplier.description:
Multiplier for the running speed of this mob while using this attack
Default: 1.0

walk_speed_multiplier.description:
Multiplier for the walking speed while using this attack
Default: 1.0

minecraft:behavior.ocelotattack.description: Can only be used by the Ocelot. Allows it to perform the sneak and pounce attack.

minecraft:behavior.offer_flower.description: Allows the mob to offer the player a flower like the Iron Golem does.

close_door_after.description:
If true, the mob will close the door after opening it and going through it
Default: true

minecraft:behavior.open_door.description: Allows the mob to open doors. Requires the mob to be able to path through doors, otherwise the mob won't even want to try opening them.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

entity_types.description: List of entity types that this mob can target if they hurt their owner

minecraft:behavior.owner_hurt_by_target.description: Allows the mob to target another mob that hurts their owner.

entity_types.description: List of entity types that this entity can target if the potential target is hurt by this mob's owner

minecraft:behavior.owner_hurt_target.description: Allows the mob to target a mob that is hurt by their owner.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

damage_sources.description: The list of Entity Damage Sources that will cause this mob to panic

force.description:
If true, this mob will not stop panicking until it can't move anymore or the goal is removed from it
Default: false

ignore_mob_damage.description:
If true, the mob will not panic in response to damage from other mobs (only fire/lava etc)
Default: false

prefer_water.description:
If true, the mob will prefer water over land
Default: false

speed_multiplier.description:
Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal
Default: 1.0

minecraft:behavior.panic.description: Allows the mob to enter the panic state, which makes it run around and away from the damage source that made it enter this state.

blocks.description: Blocks that the mob is looking for to eat/raid

eat_delay.description:
Time in seconds between each time it eats/raids
Default: 2

full_delay.description:
Amount of time in seconds before this mob wants to eat/raid again after eating its maximum
Default: 100

Distance in blocks within the mob considers it has reached the goal. This is the "wiggle room" to stop the AI from bouncing back and forth trying to reach a specific spot
Default: 0.5

Default: 1.0

Default: 10

y_dist.description:
Distance in blocks that the mob will look up or down for a new spot to move to. Must be at least 1
Default: 7

minecraft:behavior.slime_attack.description: Can only be used by Slimes and Magma Cubes. Allows the mob to use a melee attack like the slime's.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

minecraft:behavior.slime_float.description: Can only be used by Slimes and Magma Cubes. Controls their ability to float in water / lava.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

minecraft:behavior.slime_keep_on_jumping.description: Can only be used by Slimes and Magma Cubes. Allows the mob to continuously jump around like a slime.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

minecraft:behavior.slime_random_directio.description: Can only be used by Slimes and Magma Cubes. Allows the mob to move in random directions like a slime.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

items.description: Items that we are interested in snacking on

snacking_cooldown.description:
The cooldown time in seconds before the mob is able to snack again
Default: 7.5

snacking_cooldown_min.description:
The minimum time in seconds before the mob is able to snack again
Default: 0.5f

snacking_stop_chance.description:
This is the chance that the mob will stop snacking, from 0 to 1
Default: 0.0017

minecraft:behavior.snacking.description: Allows the mob to take a load off and snack on food that it found nearby.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

cooldown_time.description:
Time in seconds the mob has to wait before using the goal again
Default: 0.0

drop_item_chance.description:
The probability that the mob will drop an item when it sneezes.
Default: 1.0

entity_types.description: List of entity types this mob will startle (cause to jump) when it sneezes.

loot_table.description: Loot table to select dropped items from.

prepare_sound.description: Sound to play when the sneeze is about to happen.

prepare_time.description:
The time in seconds that the mob takes to prepare to sneeze (while the prepare_sound is playing).
Default: 1.0

probability.description:
The probability of sneezing. A value of 1.00 is 100%
Default: 0.02

sound.description: Sound to play when the sneeze occurs.

within_radius.description:
Distance in blocks that mobs will be startled.
Default: 0.0

minecraft:behavior.sneeze.description: Allows the mob to stop and sneeze possibly startling nearby mobs and dropping an item.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

minecraft:behavior.squid_dive.description: Allows the squid to dive down in water. Can only be used by the Squid.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

minecraft:behavior.squid_flee.description: Allows the squid to swim away. Can only be used by the Squid.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

minecraft:behavior.squid_idle.description: Allows the squid to swim in place idly. Can only be used by the Squid.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

minecraft:behavior.squid_move_away_from_.description: Allows the squid to move away from ground blocks and back to water. Can only be used by the Squid.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

minecraft:behavior.squid_out_of_water.description: Allows the squid to stick to the ground when outside water. Can only be used by the Squid.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

interest_time.description:
The amount of time the mob will be interested before pouncing. This happens when the mob is within range of pouncing
Default: 2.0

leap_distance.description:
The distance in blocks the mob jumps in the direction of its target
Default: 0.8

leap_height.description:
The height in blocks the mob jumps when leaping at its target
Default: 0.9

max_stalk_dist.description:
The maximum distance away a target can be before the mob gives up on stalking
Default: 10.0

pounce_max_dist.description:
The maximum distance away from the target in blocks to begin pouncing at the target
Default: 5.0

stalk_speed.description:
The movement speed in which you stalk your target
Default: 1.2

strike_dist.description:
The max distance away from the target when landing from the pounce that will still result in damaging the target
Default: 2.0

stuck_time.description:
The amount of time the mob will be stuck if they fail and land on a block they can be stuck on
Default: 2.0

minecraft:behavior.stalk_and_pounce_on_t.description: Allows a mob to stalk a target, then once within range pounce onto a target, on success the target will be attacked dealing damage defined by the attack component. On failure, the mob will risk getting stuck

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

minecraft:behavior.stay_while_sitting.description: Allows the mob to stay put while it is in a sitting state instead of doing something else.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

attack_once.description:
If true, this mob will attack only one time.
Default: false

attack_types.description: Defines the entity types this mob will attack

random_stop_interval.description:
Defines the probability the mob will stop fighting. A value of 0 disables randomly stopping, while a value of 1 defines a 50% chance
Default: 0

reach_multiplier.description:
Multiplier for how far outside its box the mob can reach its target (this can be used to simulate a mob with longer arms by making this bigger)
Default: 2.0

require_complete_path.description:
If true, this goal will only trigger if the mob can reach its target.
Default: false

speed_multiplier.description:
Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal
Default: 1.0

track_target.description:
If true, this mob will chase after the target as long as it's a valid target
Default: false

minecraft:behavior.stomp_attack.description: Allows the mob to use the polar bear's melee attack.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

goal_radius.description:
Distance in blocks within the mob considers it has reached the goal. This is the "wiggle room" to stop the AI from bouncing back and forth trying to reach a specific spot
Default: 0.5

interval.description:
A random value to determine when to randomly move somewhere. This has a 1/interval chance to choose this goal
Default: 120

search_count.description:
The number of blocks each tick that the mob will check within it's search range and height for a valid block to move to. A value of 0 will have the mob check every block within range in one tick
Default: 10

search_height.description:
Height in blocks the mob will look for turtle eggs to move towards
Default: 1

search_range.description:
The distance in blocks it will look for turtle eggs to move towards
Default: 0

speed_multiplier.description:
Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal
Default: 1.0

minecraft:behavior.stomp_turtle_egg.description: Allows this mob to stomp turtle eggs

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

cooldown_time.description:
Time in seconds the mob has to wait before using the goal again
Default: 0.0

goal_radius.description:
Distance in blocks within the mob considers it has reached the goal. This is the "wiggle room" to stop the AI from bouncing back and forth trying to reach a specific spot
Default: 0.5

search_range.description:
The distance in blocks to search for points inside villages. If <= 0, find the closest village regardless of distance.
Default: 0

speed_multiplier.description:
Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal
Default: 1.0

start_chance.description:
This is the chance that the mob will start this goal, from 0 to 1
Default: 0.1

minecraft:behavior.stroll_towards_villag.description: Allows the mob to move into a random location within a village within the search range.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

summon_choices.description: List of spells for the mob to use to summon entities. Each spell has the following parameters:

cast_duration.description:
Time in seconds the spell casting will take
Default: Total delay of the steps

cooldown_time.description:
Time in seconds the mob has to wait before using the spell again
Default: 0.0

do_casting.description:
If true, the mob will do the casting animations and render spell particles
Default: true

max_activation_range.description:
Upper bound of the activation distance in blocks for this spell
Default: -1.0

min_activation_range.description:
Lower bound of the activation distance in blocks for this spell
Default: 1.0

particle_color.description: The color of the particles for this spell

sequence.description: List of steps for the spell. Each step has the following parameters:

base_delay.description:
Amount of time in seconds to wait before this step starts
Default: 0.0

delay_per_summon.description:
Amount of time in seconds before each entity is summoned in this step
Default: 0.0

entity_lifespan.description:
Amount of time in seconds that the spawned entity will be alive for. A value of -1.0 means it will remain alive for as long as it can
Default: -1.0

entity_type.description: The entity type of the entities we will spawn in this step

num_entities_spawned.description:
Number of entities that will be spawned in this step
Default: 1

shape.description:
The base shape of this step. Valid values are circle and line
Default: line

size.description:
The base size of the entity
Default: 1.0

sound_event.description: The sound event to play for this step

summon_cap.description:
Maximum number of summoned entities at any given time
Default: 0

target.description:
The target of the spell. This is where the spell will start (line will start here, circle will be centered here)
Default: self

start_sound_event.description: The sound event to play when using this spell

weight.description:
The weight of this spell. Controls how likely the mob is to choose this spell when casting one
Default: 0.0

minecraft:behavior.summon_entity.description: Allows the mob to attack the player by summoning other entities.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

start_distance.description:
This mob starts swelling when a target is at least this many blocks away
Default: 10.0

stop_distance.description:
This mob stops swelling when a target has moved away at least this many blocks
Default: 2.0

minecraft:behavior.swell.description: Allows the creeper to swell up when a player is nearby. It can only be used by Creepers.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

speed_multiplier.description:
speed of the entity
Default: 10

minecraft:behavior.swim_wander.description: Has the fish swim around when they can't pathfind

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

delay_range.description:
Range of time in seconds between uses of this goal.
Default: [10.0, 20.0]

speed_multiplier.description:
Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal
Default: 1.0

minecraft:behavior.swoop_attack.description: Allows the mob to move to attack a target. The goal ends if it has a horizontal collision or gets hit. Built to be used with flying mobs.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

minecraft:behavior.take_flower.description: Can only be used by Villagers. Allows the mob to accept flowers from Iron Golems.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

can_get_scared.description:
If true, the mob can stop being tempted if the player moves too fast while close to this mob
Default: false

can_tempt_vertically.description:
If true, the mob will try to follow the player when being tempted, even if the mob is right above or below the player
Default: false

items.description: List of items this mob is tempted by

speed_multiplier.description:
Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal
Default: 1.0

within_radius.description:
Distance in blocks this mob can get tempted by a player holding an item they like
Default: 0.0

minecraft:behavior.tempt.description: Allows the mob to be tempted by food they like.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

carried_item_switch_time.description:
The max time in seconds that the trader will hold an item before attempting to switch for a different item that takes the same trade
Default: 2.0

cooldown.description:
The time in seconds before the trader can use this goal again
Default: 2.0

interest_time.description:
The max time in seconds that the trader will be interested with showing it's trade items
Default: 45.0

remove_item_time.description:
The max time in seconds that the trader will wait when you no longer have items to trade
Default: 1.0

within_radius.description:
Distance in blocks this mob can be interested by a player holding an item they like
Default: 0.0

minecraft:behavior.trade_interest.description: Allows the mob to look at a player that is holding a tradable item.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

minecraft:behavior.trade_with_player.description: Allows the player to trade with this mob.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

entity_types.description: List of entities this mob can copy the owner from

minecraft:behavior.vex_copy_owner_target.description: Allows the mob to target the same entity its owner is targeting.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

minecraft:behavior.vex_random_move.description: Allows the mob to move around randomly like the Vex.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

minecraft:behavior.wither_random_attack_.description: Allows the wither to launch random attacks. Can only be used by the Wither Boss.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

entity_types.description: List of entity types the wither takes into account to find who dealt the most damage to it

minecraft:behavior.wither_target_highest.description: Allows the wither to focus its attacks on whichever mob has dealt the most damage to it.

priority.description: Priority of behavior. 0 being the highest priority level

admire_item_sound.description: The sound event to play when admiring the item

sound_interval.description: The range of time in seconds to randomly wait before playing the sound again.

minecraft:behavior.barter.description: Mobs can now barter when they pick up items, or when they receive an item during an interaction. For a mob to barter they need to have both the barter goal and the barter component, and the relevant configuration need to be done in the interact component and/or the shareables component

priority.description: Specifies how the mob should prioritize this goal

minecraft:behavior.equip_item.description: Mobs can now barter when they pick up items, or when they receive an item during an interaction. For a mob to barter they need to have both the barter goal and the barter component, and the relevant configuration need to be done in the interact component and/or the shareables component

priority.description: Specifies how the mob should prioritize this goal
